text:
"In My Mind" is the first studio album by American recording artist and record producer Pharrell Williams. It was released on July 25, 2006. The album features the hit single "Can I Have It Like That" which features American singer Gwen Stefani. The album is mainly a hip hop album with R&B styles.
Reviews.
The album received generally mixed reviews from music critics.
Track listing.
All songs produced by Pharrell Williams.
Grammy Nomination.
The album was nominated for Best Rap Album at the 2007 Grammy Awards. It lost to "Release Therapy" by Ludacris.
